directions: Pour Sambuca into a chilled Martini glass. Run lemon twist around rim and add to glass. Fill cocktail shaker with ice and add vodka. Shake well, then strain chilled vodka into glass.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon black Sambuca (such as Opal Nera)
1/3 cup Absolut Citron vodka or regular vodka (about 3 oz)
title: Citron Martini with Black Sambuca
